text:
A Moment of Decision

Dark alleyway, tense atmosphere, character hesitates.  
A heavy silence looms.  
Character: “What made me think she’d be gone?”  

Character: “Why did I assume that so surely?”  
Character: “I’ve lost my chance forever!”  

---  

Porter's dark room, something glimmers under the bench.  
A mix of hope and dread.  
Character: “What is that?”  

Character: “No one’s watching... I can take it!”  
Character: “When reason fails, the devil helps!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The protagonist experiences a mix of anxiety and exhilaration upon finding an axe that he believes will aid in executing his plan.
